name: White In Colors
description:
Heyy! My self Aditya the creator of this game. This a simple, colorful game and every age person can play it. Hence it is under work and what you are playing is just 1% of the game.  I am planning to add more than 10 levels with the great adventure of player movement, environment, and a lot of other stuff you will find after the release of the original game. I am hoping for your feedback to improve this game more and make you play it will all joy and satisfaction. Please try to add your feedback for this game.

Thanks, 

Aditya
